genresAdvancedInfo.name: musica menorquina
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This genre of music is native to the Balearic Island of Menorca, Spain. It has a distinct sound that combines elements of Spanish, African, and Middle Eastern music. The traditional instruments used in this genre include the xeremia (a type of flute), the tamboril (a small drum), and the guitar. Musica Menorquina is often played during festivals and celebrations on the island.
